spec_data.Name: bontmia
spec_data.Description:
A disk based backup system which provides a complete snapshot of
backed up directories. Using a clever hardlink and rsync trick,
the backup is fast and space efficient.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 01 Aug 2017 04:24:57 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Backup over network to multiple incremental archives
